name: Ping a global hook

previews.name: superpro
previews.description:
**Note:** The [Global Webhooks API](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.16/v3/enterprise-admin/global_webhooks/) is currently available for developers to preview. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.16/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.superpro-preview+json

```

description: This will trigger a [ping event](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.16/webhooks/#ping-event) to be sent to the hook.
